SEARCH
Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Interface ErrorReporter

All Known Subinterfaces:
Parser<U,S>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseParser, MessageParser
public interface ErrorReporter
The ErrorReporter interface provides a mechanism for reporting warning messages during processing, so that different implementations can handle warnings in a manner appropriate to their context.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    ErrorReporter.DefaultErrorReporter
    The default error reporter just logs the warning message using SLF4J.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Set the error reporter for the current thread.
    default void
    truncateStackTrace(Throwable t, int framesAfterMatch, String... prefixes)
    Truncate the stack trace of the given throwable to only include frames up to and including the first frame that matches one of the given prefixes, plus a specified number of frames after that.

    Handle a warning message.

  • Method Details

    • truncateStackTrace

      default void truncateStackTrace(Throwable t, int framesAfterMatch, String... prefixes)
      Truncate the stack trace of the given throwable to only include frames up to and including the first frame that matches one of the given prefixes, plus a specified number of frames after that.
      Parameters:
      t - The throwable whose stack trace is to be truncated.
      framesAfterMatch - The number of frames to include after the matching frame.
      prefixes - The class name prefixes to match.

    • set

      static void set(ErrorReporter reporter)
      Set the error reporter for the current thread. If not set, the default reporter is used, which just logs the warning.
      Parameters:
      reporter - The error reporter to use. If null, the default reporter is used.

    • get

      static ErrorReporter get()
      Get the error reporter for the current thread. If not set, the default reporter is used, which just logs the warning.
      Returns:
      The error reporter for the current thread.

    • warn

      default void warn(String message, Object... args)
      Handle a warning message. Implementations may choose to log the message, or throw a runtime exception, to ensure that the calling code is aware of the warning.
      Parameters:
      message - The warning message
      args - The arguments. If the last argument is a Throwable, it is treated as the cause.
